titles.describeYourself: Tell the world how do you like to write your reviews
titles.whereDoYouReview: Where do you post your literary reviews?
titles.whichGenres: Which literary genres do you prefer?
titles.main: A book without reviews is a book not yet published.
titles.homeFirst: Reseñan Sancho is a site to connect writers with literary reviewers.

paragraphs.homeOne: We know that a literary review can be positive or negative, but the most important thing is it has to be honest.
paragraphs.homeTwo: Not only to publicize our novel but to improve as writers, reviews are a very important part of the editorial process.
paragraphs.homeThree: Reseñan Sancho (They Review Sancho) takes its name from the famous phrase: 'They bark, Sancho, sign that we ride'.
paragraphs.homeFour: If you have a literary blog, you are a booktuber or a bookstagramer, or you just love writing reviews of the books you read, on goodreads or amazon, we know that you will always be interested in discovering a new writer.
paragraphs.homeFive: Create your account to find books and connect with their authors. They will thank you and will be willing to send you a copy of their novel.
paragraphs.homeSix: In addition, you will participate in review contests, group reading proposals and book launches in your country.
paragraphs.homeSeven: The best way to promote your novel is someone else talking about it.
paragraphs.homeEight: A literary review is a reader recommending a book to other readers.
paragraphs.homeNine: If you want to start publicizing your work, create your account and start offering your Book hundreds of literary reviewers interested in the genre of your novel.

URL.amazon: Copia y pega la dirección de tu perfil público de amazon donde aparecen tus reseñas. La puedes encontrar en 'mi cuenta' y luego en 'mi perfil público'.
URL.booktube: Copia y pega la dirección de tu canal de Youtube.
URL.bookstagram: Copia y pega la dirección de tu perfil de Instagram.
URL.blog: Copia y pega la dirección de tu blog literario.
URL.goodreads: Copia y pega la dirección de tu perfil de Goodreads.

name.booktube: El nombre de tu canal de Youtube.
name.bookstagram: El nombre de tu perfil en Instagram.
name.blog: El nombre de tu blog literario.
name.goodreads: El nombre de tu perfil de Goodreads.

helpers.describeYourself: Some ideas to answer this question: For example, the type of books you like, if you usually interview authors, if you make raffles among your readers, if you publish only positive reviews or also negative ones, if you have a rating scale, the time it takes you to write a review since you start reading the book, etc.
helpers.searchBooks: Find Books according to your preferences:

responses.authorizationFailed: We have not been able to verify your identity. This is usually due to a problem with your browser's cookies. Please try from another browser.
responses.noPermissions: You don´t have permissions to do this operation. Contact support if you think it´s a mistake.
responses.unexpectedTokenFailure: Somthing went wrong. Please try to login again or contact support.
